topic.title: Auditing API
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server APIs for audit management.

body.p: Returns information about the audit settings.

section.title: GET /settings/audit
section.p: This command retrieves information about the audit settings.

section.title: POST /settings/audit/<settings>
section.p: This command configures the audit settings.
$ curl POST http://user:password@127.0.0.1:8091/settings/audit/auditEnabled Enable audit. Use true/false to set.

$ curl POST http://user:password@127.0.0.1:8091/settings/audit/logPathSet the location for audit logs. The default location is /opt/couchbase/var/lib/couchbase/logs. You can sdt the kocation with FREST, or with the Couchbase Web Console.
$ curl POST http://user:password@127.0.0.1:8091/settings/audit/rotateInterval Set the time in seconds for the log rotating interval.
